articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Malta bans all visitors who aren’t fully vaccinated against COVID - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Only those in possession of a British or European vaccination certificate will be allowed in from July 14.
articles.content:
Malta has said it will be the first European country to close its borders to anyone who has not been fully vaccinated against coronavirus, following a spike in COVID-19 cases.
